summary: Apply a smoothing operation to a classified datacube.
description: This process applies a smoothing operation to a classified datacube using a sliding window approach. The window size, neighborhood fraction, and smoothness factor determine the extent and behavior of the smoothing.

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: The size of the sliding window, defined in pixels. This determines the extent of the neighborhood considered during smoothing. Defaults to 7.

parameters.name: neighborhood_fraction
parameters.description: The minimum fraction of similar neighboring pixels required to apply smoothing within the window. Values range from 0 (no similarity required) to 1 (all neighbors must be similar). Defaults to 0.5.

parameters.name: smoothness
parameters.description: A factor that controls the intensity of the smoothing effect. Higher values result in stronger smoothing. Defaults to 10.
